about_the_game:
Medieval Book

This Medieval-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Experience Romanticised European History at its finest with this book!

From Knights and Armour to the peasants in the fields, this book covers it all.

Contents

The Medieval book unlocks the following images:
  • Archer - 32x44
  • Scroll - 36x71
  • Shield - 47x72
  • Silver Groat - 50x50
  • Crossbow - 71x74
  • Sword in the Stone - 74x122
  • Aftermath - 78x108
  • Paladin - 88x127
  • Helmet - 92x110
  • Templar Knight - 102x162
  • Trumpet - 108x52
  • Sir John - 118x96
  • Medieval House - 132x119
  • Breach - 146x138
  • Jester - 147x49
  • Catapult - 172x126
  • Blacksmith - 176x98
  • Simple Living - 179x198
  • Ink and Quill - 216x175
  • Zweihander - 350x65

From Knights and Armour to the peasants in the fields, this book covers it all.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Medieval Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
